title: Affordable segment to be the focus next fiscal, says LIC Housing Finance MD
description: LIC Housing Finance plans to boost business growth by increasing its stake in the affordable segment of the housing loan market. Managing director Tribhuwan Adhikari stated that the lender aims to raise the share of the affordable home loan portfolio to one-fifth of the total portfolio. The lender's outstanding loan portfolio grew 5% to Rs 2.81 lakh crore. They will now target the self-employed segment, which has shown significant demand.
